/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with cars and trucks, stretches out into the distance, flanked by trees on both sides. The sky above is a hazy gray, suggesting an overcast day. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban landscape interspersed with patches of nature. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, emphasizing the vastness of the cityscape.
